channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for VA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for VA

item.title: Report E-2023100668
item.description:
Report E-2023100668

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-27T18:13:30+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-10
  • City: COLONIAL HEIGHTS
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDEX FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Associate did not block and/or brace freight properly for transport. Freight was crushed causing release of product.

item.title: Report I-2023100003
item.description:
Report I-2023100003

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-25T00:33:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-31
  • City: South Hill
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FERRELLGAS
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 1
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Bobtail Roll Over Accident. The Wheel went off the side of the road, driver tried to pull it back onto the road and lost control. No other vehicles involved. No other property damage. Ferrellgas Employee was injured and taken by ambulance to a local hospital where he was treated and released. There was a minimal release of propane of approx 5.2 gallons. A piping broke that connected to the filler system. The Ferrellgas employee was able to turn the shut off valve to the tank.
